ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh, what a perfect example of a game that ships bug free.   LOL.
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh, what a perfect example of a game that ships bug free. LOL.

> If you want a game that never changes, do not play an online game. Buy one
> of the off the shelf games. Daggerfall. Or something like taht. Online games
> will change on you.
